author: cms-L1TK
body:
#### PR description:

This PR includes several updates to the Phase-2 L1 tracking. Important updates: 

- add ML-based TrackQuality as an optional, including adding "set" functions for the associated MVA variables in the TTTrack
- add fix to Kalman Filter track fitter to improve efficiency for electron tracks
- enable truncation by default in the pattern recognition (and update truncation to match firmware) 
- add "approximate" calculations also for the displaced tracking algorithm (i.e. matching what can be done in firmware) 
- code developments to improve writing output files needed for HLS, etc. 

#### PR validation:

Extensive performance studies performed, documented here: 

https://indico.cern.ch/event/985653/contributions/4153943/attachments/2164102/3652037/L1Algo_Dec_16_Jack.pdf

Expected slight reduced efficiency in busy events (eg ttbar + PU=200) due to enabling truncation, expected increased efficiency for forward electrons due to fixes. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is not a backport.
title: Update Phase-2 L1 track algorithm code
